statements: SELECT * FROM patient_compliance_data;
SELECT patient_id, adherence_level FROM patient_compliance_data WHERE adherence_level > 0.8;
SELECT treatment_outcome FROM patient_compliance_data WHERE patient_id = 100;
SELECT patient_id, adherence_level, treatment_outcome FROM patient_compliance_data ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM patient_compliance_data WHERE treatment_outcome = 'Successful' ORDER BY adherence_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM patient_compliance_data ORDER BY adherence_level ASC, treatment_outcome DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT patient_id, treatment_outcome FROM patient_compliance_data WHERE adherence_level > 0.8;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM patient_compliance_data;
SELECT patient_id, AVG(adherence_level) AS avg_adherence FROM patient_compliance_data GROUP BY patient_id HAVING avg_adherence > 0.5;
SELECT DISTINCT treatment_outcome FROM patient_compliance_data WHERE patient_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE adherence_level > 80
SELECT patient_name, treatment_outcome FROM Patients WHERE adherence_level < 50
SELECT patient_name, adherence_level, treatment_outcome FROM Patients
SELECT * FROM Compliance WHERE compliance_level > 90
SELECT compliance_date, compliance_level FROM Compliance
SELECT * FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT patient_name, treatment_outcome FROM Patients WHERE adherence_level > 80;
SELECT patient_name, compliance_date FROM Patients JOIN Compliance ON Patients.patient_id = Compliance.patient_id WHERE Compliance.compliance_level < 70;
SELECT patient_name, treatment_outcome FROM Patients WHERE patient_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT patient_name, adherence_level, compliance_level FROM Patients JOIN Compliance ON Patients.patient_id = Compliance.patient_id ORDER BY adherence_level ASC, compliance_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM patient_data WHERE patient_id = 123;
SELECT drug_name, adherence_level FROM patient_data WHERE treatment_outcome = 'Successful';
SELECT age, gender, city FROM patient_demographics WHERE age > 40;
SELECT treatment_id, drug_name, dosage FROM treatment_schedule WHERE schedule_time >= '08:00:00';
SELECT patient_id, drug_name, treatment_outcome FROM patient_data WHERE adherence_level = 'High';
SELECT * FROM patient_data WHERE adherence_level='High' ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT patient_id, drug_name FROM patient_data WHERE treatment_outcome='Successful' ORDER BY patient_id ASC;
SELECT patient_id, age, gender, city FROM patient_demographics WHERE age > 30 AND gender='Male';
SELECT * FROM treatment_schedule WHERE drug_name='Aspirin' AND dosage='50mg' AND schedule_time BETWEEN '08:00:00' AND '12:00:00';
SELECT patient_id, drug_name, adherence_level, treatment_outcome FROM patient_data WHERE adherence_level='Low' OR treatment_outcome='Failed' ORDER BY patient_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age FROM Patients WHERE age > 40;
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT treatment_name, start_date, end_date FROM Treatments;
SELECT treatment_id, outcome_description FROM Outcomes WHERE outcome_description LIKE '%improved%';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients;
SELECT * FROM Treatments WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY treatment_name DESC;
SELECT t.treatment_name, c.compliance_level, p.patient_name FROM Treatments t JOIN Compliance c ON t.treatment_id = c.treatment_id JOIN Patients p ON c.patient_id = p.patient_id;
SELECT DISTINCT treatment_id, outcome_description FROM Outcomes WHERE outcome_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender, drug_adherence_level FROM Patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY drug_adherence_level DESC, patient_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM PatientData WHERE patient_id = 123;
SELECT patient_id, adherence_level, treatment_outcome FROM PatientData WHERE treatment_duration > 30;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT treatment_name, treatment_duration FROM Treatments WHERE treatment_duration < 10;
SELECT adherence_description FROM AdherenceLevels WHERE level_id = 2;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT treatment_name, treatment_duration FROM Treatments WHERE treatment_duration > 14 ORDER BY treatment_duration ASC;
SELECT p.patient_name, t.treatment_name, a.adherence_description FROM Patients p INNER JOIN Treatments t ON p.patient_id = t.treatment_id INNER JOIN AdherenceLevels a ON t.treatment_duration > 20;

SELECT patient_name, adherence_level, outcome_description FROM Patients INNER JOIN PatientData ON Patients.patient_id = PatientData.patient_id INNER JOIN TreatmentOutcomes ON PatientData.treatment_outcome = TreatmentOutcomes.outcome_id;

SELECT p.patient_name, a.adherence_description, to.outcome_description, t.treatment_name FROM Patients p INNER JOIN PatientData pd ON p.patient_id = pd.patient_id INNER JOIN AdherenceLevels a ON pd.adherence_level = a.level_id INNER JOIN TreatmentOutcomes to ON pd.treatment_outcome = to.outcome_id INNER JOIN Treatments t ON pd.treatment_duration = t.treatment_duration;
